summary: John Martin is a government agent working under cover. Leading citizen Morgan calls in gunman Galt who blows Martin's cover.
cast: John Wayne|Lucile Browne|George 'Gabby' Hayes|LeRoy Mason|Lloyd Ingraham|Jay Wilsey|Frank Ball|Bert Dillard|Tommy Coats|Art Dillard|Frank Ellis|Fern Emmett|Jack Evans|Olin Francis|Herman Hack|Lafe McKee|Buck Morgan|Artie Ortego|Tex Palmer|Eddie Parker|Tex Phelps|Henry Roquemore
director: Director: Robert N. Bradbury (as R.N. Bradbury)
title: El valle del arco iris
